p: Libraries were produced using the TruSeq Stranded mRNA and subjected to Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired-end sequencing. The trimming software skewer was used to process raw fastq files and QC statistics. The trimmed paired-end reads were aligned against human genome hg38 using Salmon 1.3 [ 27]. Mapped paired-end reads for both genes and transcripts (isoforms) were counted in each sample using RNA-Seq by Expectation Maximization (RSEM). Contrasts were compared for genotypes and treatment conditions using DESeq2 [ 28].
